fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 968: Harbinger will always spawn
- 93: Plaguebearer, 94: Pestilence, and 384: Pestilence, Horseman of the Apocalypse can't spawn with the Horsemen.
- No factional chat, Horsemen members don't know each others' roles or names.
- No factional kill
- Horsemen Evil roles are recruited into the faction by the Harbinger, until the Harbinger dies

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill every other player, including the other Horsemen. / Protect the Harbinger and eliminate all who would oppose the Horsemen. (when recruited)

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill every other player, including the other Horsemen. / Protect the Harbinger and eliminate all who would oppose the Horsemen. (when recruited)
